description:
In this course you will learn to create powerful and flexible websites with Drupal 8. Drupal is the open source content management system preferred by larger organisations. 

I will guide you through the course step by step introducing Drupal 8 and how to make use of its various functions and features.

Drupal skills are in good demand and large companies pay good rates to get Drupal talent. Here is your opportunity and learn Drupal 8 now.If you want to be a serious web designer for large organisations.  Taking this course will put you on the right track.
title: Drupal 8 Essential Training
